page.title: 11THE SPECIAL EVENT
page.content: On the day of Ten Tors there is a Special Event for disabled young people. Like the main event it is walked over different distances up to 14 miles but is completed in one day. Each party is accompanied by members of the Junior Leaders Regiment. Adults from the young people's schools, homes or clubs and the Okehampton Ramblers keep a watchful eye on the progress these courageous walkers. The fact that nearly all of them complete the course is a lesson to all of those who are more able bodied.
